revised_title: Discovery and Naming of Georgium Sidus
tldr: In this letter, William Herschel announces the discovery of a new planet in 1781 and proposes the name "Georgium Sidus" in honor of King George III. He expresses his gratitude to the Royal Society and the British monarchy for their support of scientific endeavors. The letter also highlights the importance of naming the new celestial body to distinguish it from other planets and stars.
